item.description:
Melanie Joy will be giving a talk and doing a book signing for her new book on the psychology of meat, entitled “Why We Love Dogs, Eat Pigs, and Wear Cows: An Introduction to Carnism” in two Boston-area locations in January. Both events are free.

The first is at Porter Square Books in Cambridge. The event is on Wednesday, January 13, 7:00 pm. Click here for details. www.portersquarebooks.com/event/melanie-joy-why-we-love-dogs-eat-pigs-and-wear-cows-introduction-carnism

On Friday, January 29 at 7:00 pm she will be at the Harvard Coop Bookstore in Cambridge. Click here for details.
harvardcoopbooks.bncollege.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet /BNCBcalendarEventListView?langId=-1&storeId=52084&catalogId=&eventMonth=12&eventYear=2009&showStoreId=52084

Posted by: www.essenic.com
item.name: Vegan Author Melanie Joy
